The Cryptic Crossword: Sunday, October 2, 2022

Get into broken cases, inserting head of crowbar (6)

Type of Clue   Charades
Cryptic / Straight   Get into broken cases, inserting head of crowbar
Solution and Explanation

  ACCESS (synonym of to get into)


  • broken cases→ ACESS (anagram of cases)
  • head of crowbar→ C (first letter of crowbar)
  • inserting→ ACCESS (insert C into ACESS)
